description: Africa Energy Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and production of oil and gas properties. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia and currently employs 8 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2010-10-05. The firm focuses on the BLOCK 2B in South Africa. Block 2B covers approximately 4,360 square kilometers of the South African Western offshore approximately 300 kilometers north of Cape Town. Block 2B is an under explored, shallow water area off the west coast of South Africa containing a proven hydrocarbon-bearing rift basin.
naicsNationalIndustry: Crude Petroleum and Natural Gas Extraction
name: Africa Energy Corp
